section.title: Simple Render Engine

desc_content.paragraph: Render engine

field_body.paragraph: boolean array of 20 items, default (False, False, False, False, False, False, False, False, False, False, False, False, False, False, False, False, False, False, False, False)

desc_content.paragraph: Export scene data for render
Render scene into an image
Bake passes

list_item.paragraph: pass_type (enum in ['COMBINED', 'AO', 'SHADOW', 'NORMAL', 'UV', 'ROUGHNESS', 'EMIT', 'ENVIRONMENT', 'DIFFUSE', 'GLOSSY', 'TRANSMISSION', 'SUBSURFACE']) – Pass, Pass to bake
pass_filter (int in [0, inf]) – Pass Filter, Filter to combined, diffuse, glossy, transmission and subsurface passes
object_id (int in [0, inf]) – Object Id, Id of the current object being baked in relation to the others
num_pixels (int in [0, inf]) – Number of Pixels, Size of the baking batch
depth (int in [0, inf]) – Pixels depth, Number of channels

desc_content.paragraph: Update on data changes for viewport render
Draw viewport render
Compile shader script node
Update the render passes that will be generated
Request redraw for viewport rendering
Request update call for viewport rendering
Create render result to write linear floating point render layers and passes

list_item.paragraph: layer (string, (optional, never None)) – Layer, Single layer to get render result for
view (string, (optional, never None)) – View, Single view to get render result for

desc_content.paragraph: Signal that pixels have been updated and can be redrawn in the user interface
All pixels in the render result have been set and are final

list_item.paragraph: cancel (boolean, (optional)) – Cancel, Don’t mark tile as done, don’t merge results unless forced
highlight (boolean, (optional)) – Highlight, Don’t mark tile as done yet
do_merge_results (boolean, (optional)) – Merge Results, Merge results even if cancel=true

desc_content.paragraph: Add a pass to the render layer

list_item.paragraph: name (string, (never None)) – Name, Name of the Pass, without view or channel tag
chan_id (string, (never None)) – Channel IDs, Channel names, one character per channel
layer (string, (optional, never None)) – Layer, Single layer to add render pass to

desc_content.paragraph: Get final result for non-pixel operations
Test if the render operation should been canceled, this is a fast call that should be used regularly for responsiveness
active_view_get
active_view_set

field_body.paragraph: view (string, (never None)) – View, Single view to set as active

desc_content.paragraph: camera_shift_x
camera_model_matrix

field_body.paragraph: Model Matrix, Normalized camera model matrix
float multi-dimensional array of 4 * 4 items in [-inf, inf]

desc_content.paragraph: use_spherical_stereo
Update and signal to redraw render status text
Evaluate scene at a different frame (for motion blur)
Update progress percentage of render

field_body.paragraph: progress (float in [0, 1]) – Percentage of render that’s done

desc_content.paragraph: Update memory usage statistics

list_item.paragraph: memory_used (float in [0, inf], (optional)) – Current memory usage in megabytes
memory_peak (float in [0, inf], (optional)) – Peak memory usage in megabytes

desc_content.paragraph: Report info, warning or error messages
Set error message displaying after the render is finished
Bind GLSL fragment shader that converts linear colors to display space colors using scene color management settings
Unbind GLSL display space shader, must always be called after binding the shader
Test if GLSL display space shader is supported for the combination of graphics card and scene settings
Get the pixel size that should be used for preview rendering
Register a render pass that will be part of the render with the current settings

field_body.paragraph: The RNA type or default when not found.
The class or default when not found.
